alert.note: Alert for Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 11:13PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gillespie and southern Llano Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1113 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Castell, or 10 miles southwest of Llano, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oxford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Texas.
